commands.name: az databoxedge device share create
commands.syntax:
az databoxedge device share create --access-protocol {NFS, SMB}
                                   --device-name
                                   --monitoring-status {Disabled, Enabled}
                                   --name
                                   --resource-group
                                   --share-status {NeedsAttention, OK, Offline, Unknown, Updating}
                                   [--azure-container-info]
                                   [--client-access-rights]
                                   [--data-policy {Cloud, Local}]
                                   [--description]
                                   [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                   [--refresh-details]
                                   [--user-access-rights]
examples: az databoxedge device share create -g rg -n share-name --device-name name --access-protocol NFS --monitoring-status Enabled --share-status OK --azure-container-info '{containerName:testContainer,dataFormat:BlockBlob,storageAccountCredentialId:/subscriptions/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000/resourceGroups/resourcegroup/providers/Microsoft.DataBoxEdge/dataBoxEdgeDevices/testedgedevice/storageAccountCredentials/accountname}'

commands.name: az databoxedge device share delete
commands.summary: Delete the share on the Data Box Edge/Data Box Gateway device.
commands.syntax:
az databoxedge device share delete [--device-name]
                                   [--ids]
                                   [--name]
                                   [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                   [--resource-group]
                                   [--subscription]
                                   [--yes]
examples: az databoxedge device share delete -g rg -n share-name --device-name name

commands.name: az databoxedge device share list
commands.summary: List all the shares in a Data Box Edge/Data Box Gateway device.
examples: az databoxedge device share list -g rg --device-name name

commands.name: az databoxedge device share show
examples: az databoxedge device share show -g rg -n share-name --device-name name

commands.name: az databoxedge device share update
commands.syntax:
az databoxedge device share update [--access-protocol {NFS, SMB}]
                                   [--add]
                                   [--azure-container-info]
                                   [--client-access-rights]
                                   [--data-policy {Cloud, Local}]
                                   [--description]
                                   [--device-name]
                                   [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                   [--ids]
                                   [--monitoring-status {Disabled, Enabled}]
                                   [--name]
                                   [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                   [--refresh-details]
                                   [--remove]
                                   [--resource-group]
                                   [--set]
                                   [--share-status {NeedsAttention, OK, Offline, Unknown, Updating}]
                                   [--subscription]
                                   [--user-access-rights]
examples: az databoxedge device share update -g rg -n share-name --device-name name --description test
